description: A protein involved in controlling intestinal mucosal homeostasis.
A chemical used to induce colitis in experimental models.
A ligand of the Aryl hydrocarbon receptor (AhR) used in the study.
A group of inflammatory conditions of the colon and small intestine.
A cytokine involved in systemic inflammation and a key regulator of immune cells.
A cytokine that is critical for innate and adaptive immunity against viral and intracellular bacterial infections.
Myosin light chain, involved in muscle contraction and cellular functions.
Myosin light chain kinase, an enzyme that phosphorylates myosin light chain.
A protein component of the NF-κB transcription factor complex involved in cellular responses to stimuli.
